entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
